author: Carl Edwards Jr
comment: It's a cool app, works perfect for me. Has a little lag but I have a moto 360 (1st gen).. It take getting use to becuase you can flip the screen sideways or use the front camera. I have not tried the zoom yet. But all in all its a pretty good app.

author: Clenton Thompson
comment: Would give it 5 if video recording was possible. Otherwise, great app

author: Anthony Smith
comment: This app will be 5* if you just and the ability to have a custom file path! That's a huge drawback that it can only save to 2 predefined locations
title: Really nice buuuuut...

author: Lee White
comment: It would just be nice to be able to save to the SD card.
title: Love the app.

author: Gary Tarbell
comment: Piece of sh## app, paid for, installed, does nothing.  Emailed them, no response.
title: Worthless

author: Shahriar Khan
comment: Image need to save on SD card. Please update with ability to save image in SD card.
title: Image need to save on SD card

author: Steve Paine
comment: Runs on my LG fine
title: Very goog

author: Kevin Huang
comment: Woah, I was blown away by this app. Now I can finally take selfie with the better back camera w/ option of flash, not that I take selfie that much but...    The only thing I would improve is if the app could remember my settings, like the count-down timer, rotation, sound..etc so I don't have to change it everytime I restart the app.  Please include this on your next update.   Thanks!

author: Chris Andrews
comment: Good idea, but 1) takes pictures upside down (for me at least), and 2) then it was difficult to find the pictures on the phone.   I have it set to camera(dcim) folder -> internal storage/dcim but it doesn't go into the same folder my camera uses. So would be nice if there was an option to add it to my regular camera folder. Using Nexus 5X and Moto 360 2nd gen. Guess I'll keep the app for now and hope these are fixed...

author: John Phillippi
comment: So far, so good!  Works great with my Moto 360 G2 and Galaxy S6.  Very intuitive, easy to use and VERY well featured.

author: james summerfield
comment: Slow shutter and no video, needs to be improved.
title: Moto 360 and s6 edge +

comment: using on my nexus 6p. Front camera view shows upside down. Thats my review from 2 minutes of use.

author: Shaun Mulrainey
comment: Absolutely brilliant a very must have A+
title: Shaun

author: Shayna McCombs
comment: Worth every penny. Works great. Super easy to operate. Loads right to the gallery of my phone!!
title: Amazing!

author: Juan Armenta
comment: I recommed this app

author: Ryan Sabia
comment: So far from what I have tried this is the best Android Wear camera remote app.  The view finder is quick and good quality and the response to the phone is good and accurate. No issues so far.   What would make this app incredible and features i would love to see are: - Remote video - Ability to move setting buttons around. The "take picture" button on the bottom of the Moto 360 screen can sometimes be finicky to activate.
title: Best Android Wear Camera remote app

author: Michael Ortiz
comment: I could be doing something wrong, I'm on 5.0 Nexus 5.... downloaded the app. Android wear is up and connected but its not in my start list...
title: Doesn't show on my Moto

author: kevin sullivan
comment: The app works great  but just one tiny niggle   when you want to change the resolution it seems fiddly to do as does not always responds Takes a while.    Hope that fix that issue.
title: Great app so far

author: Mike Thompson
comment: Really cool app, love the fact that I can now take selfies from a distance  away. Really easy user interface. If you could add the ability to video record it would be the best thing since sliced bread.
title: Great app works like a dream

author: Shane Morton
comment: Did what it describes, but my only issues are I wish I could change the camera settings from the phone, and my Moto 360 started feeling incredibly warm on my wrist after testing. Tried swiping right to close, but it was still warm. Shut down the watch to cool it down.
title: Works as expected

author: Mark Booker
comment: Great visual app an control of phone would be even better if it had voice control for actually taking pictures.  The reason i only give this a 3 is because even after closing the app the watch battery is drained very fast.  Following my feedback, the app was updated and now does not appear to adversely affect the battery life, would be really great if the addition of a voice activated command to take a photo was added.

reply.author: watea network
reply.content:
Thank you for your feedback.
I've updated the app for this problem.
Would you please check the update.
Thank you.

title: Good and Getting Better

author: Doug LeDuc
comment: EXCELLENT! BUT, when will we see a video capture button as well? To start 4k video or 1080 video capture. Like click the video button and turn off your watch screen and just let your camera film.

author: Efrain Agosto
comment: Excellent app I'm just loving this. So stable and smooth. I will highly recommend this of you want remote camera.
title: Nexus 6 + G Watch R

author: Ramdana
comment: Flash mode selector and resolution selector didn't work when using rear camera ..... help please.

author: Bobby Kingsberry
comment: Works as described.  Love the No Shutter Sound feature.  Provide the ability to start video remotely and you have a winner !
title: Great App could be better

author: Edwin Mejia
comment: The app is awesome being able to access the camera from a distance. but it would be nice to also be able to have the option to have the image on the phone screen if needed. Example if someone is holding the phone for you how can they tell where they are aiming at.
title: Great and improving

author: Jacob Delgado
comment: Works but gets stuck on the taking picture words and does nothing, want a refund
title: No pictures

author: Trent Mastin
comment: It's been 2 days and still won't sync to my watch, I have restarted my watch and phone, done factory reset, uninstalled and reinstalled, still nothing, IT DOES NOT WORK
title: Galaxy s5

author: Gama Goat
comment: Used to get 40 hours easy on my Moro 360,  now can't make it through day. Have to uninstall.
title: Great app, but drains battery

author: Christopher Lye
comment: Can't get it to work on oNepLus oNe running ColorOS. Can't refund either as pass the 15 minutes trial period :(
title: Does not work on ColorOS

author: Matthew Brewster
comment: Does not take/store photo on S6 but looks like could have been a good and handy app

reply.author: watea network
reply.content:
thank you for your feedback.
please feel free to contact our email address,
and tell us your situation in detail,

title: Samsung S6 Edge

author: Percival Mayo
comment: Reinstalled but now will not work. Nothing is showing

reply.author: watea network
reply.content:

I've updated the app,would you please recheck it?
Thank you.

author: Palwinder Jutley
comment: This is the best app for androidwear trust me hope it gets a video button will be complete.
title: Super app

author: Derek Peldo
comment: +1 star for saving pics to the same folder as the camera and video.
title: Awesome app. Does what it says it does.

author: boody_warrior 69
comment: Be able to be a way to switch from taking pictures to recording
title: Good just need one thing

author: Luis Mashuca
comment: Works really well with my Moto360, could be a little faster but it's is still a very good app.
title: Works great!

author: Fazlee Majeed
comment: On OnePlus One, it doesn't fill the entire watch face with the image... There are black bars on the sides

author: Michael Hunnicutt
comment: Since latest update, there is no start function on the 360 and voice command does not start app.

reply.author: watea network
reply.content:
Thank you for your feedback.
Please feel free to contact our email address.And tell us more of your situation.I'd like to improve.

title: Cannot start app with new update

author: Ujomah Taylor
comment: Its ok but it would be a lot better if you could make the phone record video.
title: No video

author: Jesse Langford
comment: Just says taking photo and never does. Should add option to video.
title: Taking photo
